```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(magrittr)
library(lubridate)
library(data.table)
```

# Load trips

## Get relevant filename
```{r}
trips_filename <- list.files('data_raw', pattern = 'divvy_trips_[0-9]{4}(_[0-9]{2}){2}_.*\\.csv') %>% max()
trips_filename
```

## Read the file and convert types
```{r}
trips <- fread(trips_filename, na.strings = c(""))
trips[
  , 
  `:=`(
    start_time = as_datetime(start_time),
    stop_time = as_datetime(stop_time)
    ), 
  ]
glimpse(trips)
```
